name: Teesside University Research Portal
description: Welcome to Teesside University's research portal, where you will find out more about our staff and doctoral students, research activities and outputs, and the impact which our work makes in our local community, the UK and globally. The portal includes TeesRep, a collection of peer-reviewed and practice-based research, including PhD theses, by Teesside University authors. It also links to datasets and research data, following an Open Access Policy.
